1159040.name: KENDO
1159040.description:
KENDO is a pure VR sword fighting game focused on realism. Enter a virtual dojo and face a series of unique practitioners with their own styles and techniques. Use timing and skill to land the winning point. Dodge thrusts, swing and lock shinais to follow the true way of the warrior.

Room-scale is required with a minimum supported play area size of 2m by 1.5m (6.5ft by 5ft). Please ensure your SteamVR Chaperone boundaries or Oculus Guardian boundaries are set up properly for room-scale and that you are willing to move and swing anywhere within and around the play area you have defined.

Oculus users: Native Oculus support is included. If you are not prompted to launch the game in native Oculus mode, right-click the game in your Steam games list and choose "Launch KENDO in Oculus VR mode."
1159040.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
